description: Amber Deakin, 18, died when car carrying six people crashed during police chase near Bradford.
title: Baildon: Car passenger admits role in fatal crash
title_page: Baildon: Car passenger admits role in fatal crash - BBC News
maintext:
A car passenger has admitted a charge of aiding and abetting death by dangerous driving after a crash in which an 18-year-old woman was killed.
Amber Deakin died on 3 January 2023 when a Vauxhall Vectra being driven by Jordan Spalding crashed on Baildon Road in Bradford, following a police chase.
Shakeel Ahmed, of Moresby Road in Bradford, pleaded guilty to one offence relating to the incident at Bradford Crown Court on Friday.
The 28-year-old was charged alongside 22-year-old Spalding, who has already admitted causing the young mother's death by dangerous driving.
